See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SLU * Contributions are Copyright (C) 2001-2008 Openbravo, S.L.U. * * Specifically, this derivative work is based upon the following Compiere * file and version. ************************************************************************* * $Id: R_Request_DueType.sql,v 1.2 2001/12/04 05:30:26 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Return updated Request Due Type * Description: * Set Due Type 3-Overdue 5-Due 7-Scheduled ************************************************************************/ BEGIN -- scheduled IF(TRUNC(p_ActionDate) > TRUNC(now())) THEN RETURN '7'; -- overdue ELSIF(TRUNC(p_ActionDate) < TRUNC(now()+p_ToleranceDays)) THEN RETURN '3'; END IF; -- RETURN '5'; END R_REQUEST_DUETYPE
